sentences.sCn: 他们在得克萨斯州定居下来了。

sentences.sContent: He echoed what was said in Jasper, Texas, a year ago.
sentences.sCn: 他是在重复一年前在德克萨斯州杰士伯说过的话。

sentences.sContent: "We have not seen any linkage at all between the cases in Texas and California," he said.
sentences.sCn: “在德克萨斯和加利福尼亚的病人中我们没有找到任何的共性。” 他说。
